description2: The year is 1939, and while England is at war, a tumultuous love affair is about to begin that will carry a tragic price tag.

title: Sherpa
description: In 2014, filmmakers set out to tell the lesser-known story of Himalayan guides who risk everything to support climbers on Mount Everest. Instead, they captured a tragedy that would change Everest forever. (2015)
description2: In 2014, filmmakers set out to tell the lesser-known story of Himalayan guides who risk everything to support climbers on Mount Everest. Instead, they captured a tragedy that would change Everest forever.

title: The Night We Called It A Day
episode_name: The Night We Called It A Day
description: Leading an all star cast, Joel Edgerton stars as Rod Blue, a down-on-his-luck rock promoter who secures the ultimate coup: ol' blue eyes himself, Frank Sinatra. There are some nights you never forget. (2003)
description2: Leading an all star cast, Joel Edgerton stars as Rod Blue, a down-on-his-luck rock promoter who secures the ultimate coup: ol' blue eyes himself, Frank Sinatra. There are some nights you never forget.

title: A Secret
description: The moving saga of a Jewish family in post-war Paris, told through the eyes of a frail and intelligent young boy, who senses something is amiss with his beautiful parents. (2007)
description2: The moving saga of a Jewish family in post-war Paris, told through the eyes of a frail and intelligent young boy, who senses something is amiss with his beautiful parents.

title: Not Suitable For Children
description: When play boy Jonah is diagnosed with testicular cancer he learns he has one month until he becomes infertile. Faced with limited options, he sets out to procreate as much as possible. (2012)
description2: When play boy Jonah is diagnosed with testicular cancer he learns he has one month until he becomes infertile. Faced with limited options, he sets out to procreate as much as possible.

title: Mabo
description: The remarkable life story of Eddie 'Koiki' Mabo; a Torres Strait Islander who left school at the age of 15, yet spearheaded the High Court challenge that overthrew the fiction of terra nullius. (2012)
description2: The remarkable life story of Eddie 'Koiki' Mabo a Torres Strait Islander who left school at the age of 15, yet spearheaded the High Court challenge that overthrew the fiction of terra nullius.

title: I'm Not There
description: Inspired by the life and music of legendary singer-songwriter Bob Dylan, six characters bring to life the story of an enigmatic icon. (2007)
description2: Inspired by the life and music of legendary singer-songwriter Bob Dylan, six characters bring to life the story of an enigmatic icon.

title: Snow Cake
description: The heart-warming story of an unlikely friendship between and autistic woman, and a man left traumatised after a car accident. (2005)
description2: The heart-warming story of an unlikely friendship between and autistic woman, and a man left traumatised after a car accident.

title: Tempe Tip
description: Max Franklin's search for the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow begins with a hole in the ground in his backyard. What follows becomes a quest to rival the Holy Grail. (2000)
description2: Max Franklin's search for the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow begins with a hole in the ground in his backyard. What follows becomes a quest to rival the Holy Grail.

title: The Broken Shore
description: An evocative crime thriller set against a background of police corruption, racism and family tragedy. Based on the novel by Peter Temple. (2012)
description2: An evocative crime thriller set against a background of police corruption, racism and family tragedy. Based on the novel by Peter Temple.

title: Mr Smith Goes To Washington
description: When a naive young man is appointed to the United States Senate he finds himself in the midst of political corruption and decides to take on the powers-that-be in the nation's capitol. (1939)
description2: When a naive young man is appointed to the United States Senate he finds himself in the midst of political corruption and decides to take on the powers-that-be in the nation's capitol.

title: Let Me In
description: Bullied and lonley, 12-year-old Owen befriends Abby, a mysterious girl who moves in next door. When a string of gruesome murders grips the town, Owen begins to suspect that Abby may be hiding a dark secret. (2010)
description2: Bullied and lonley, 12-year-old Owen befriends Abby, a mysterious girl who moves in next door. When a string of gruesome murders grips the town, Owen begins to suspect that Abby may be hiding a dark secret.

title: Thunderstruck
description: Five best friends, and devoted AC/DC fans, make a pact to that if any of them should die, the others will bury him next to Bon Scott. 12 years later they come together to fulfill the promise. (2004)
description2: Five best friends, and devoted AC/DC fans, make a pact to that if any of them should die, the others will bury him next to Bon Scott. 12 years later they come together to fulfill the promise.

title: South Solitary
description: Meredith, thirty and unmarried, arrives at a remote lighthouse island with her uncle, the new head keeper. Bad weather and misadventure leave her marooned with assistant keeper, Fleet. A tender, faltering courtship ensues. (2010)
description2: Meredith, thirty and unmarried, arrives at a remote lighthouse island with her uncle, the new head keeper. Bad weather and misadventure leave her marooned with assistant keeper, Fleet. A tender, faltering courtship ensues.

title: Ghost Stories
description: Professor Phillip Goodman devotes his life to exposing phony psychics and fraudulent supernatural shenanigans. His scepticism soon gets put to the test when he receives news of three chilling and inexplicable cases. (2017)
description2: Professor Phillip Goodman devotes his life to exposing phony psychics and fraudulent supernatural shenanigans. His scepticism soon gets put to the test when he receives news of three chilling and inexplicable cases.

title: Three Kingdoms
description: Zhao Zilong, a common man heeds the call of duty and from the humblest of roots rises to command an army charged with liberating the land from an evil warlord. Based on Romance of the Three Kingdoms' by Luo Guangzhong. (2008)
description2: Zhao Zilong, a common man heeds the call of duty and from the humblest of roots rises to command an army charged with liberating the land from an evil warlord. Based on Romance of the Three Kingdoms' by Luo Guangzhong.

title: 30 Days Of Night
description: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a maniacal horde of vampires. The local sheriff, and a small but resilient band of survivors, work to help the few remaining townsfolk survive. (2007)
description2: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a maniacal horde of vampires. The local sheriff, and a small but resilient band of survivors, work to help the few remaining townsfolk survive.

title: A Royal Night Out

description2: May 1945. V.E. Day. England celebrates victory. Cloistered away in Buckingham Palace are young Princesses Elizabeth and Margaret, who would do anything to join the biggest party London has ever seen.

title: Project Nim
description: The peculiar life of a chimpanzee who became the subject of a landmark experiment, taken from its mother and raised as a human to see if chimps could learn language. (2011)
description2: The peculiar life of a chimpanzee who became the subject of a landmark experiment, taken from its mother and raised as a human to see if chimps could learn language.

title: Being Julia
description: Successful stage actress Julia finds herself swept up in a love affair with a young actor, but love turns to revenge when she realises that his motives are not what they appear to be. (2004)
description2: Successful stage actress Julia finds herself swept up in a love affair with a young actor, but love turns to revenge when she realises that his motives are not what they appear to be.

title: Suburban Mayhem
description: When her father threatens to contact social services and take away her child, Katrina sets in motion a plan to wreak suburban mayhem that will leave a community in shock and Katrina infamous in a way she never dreamed of. (2006)
description2: When her father threatens to contact social services and take away her child, Katrina sets in motion a plan to wreak suburban mayhem that will leave a community in shock and Katrina infamous in a way she never dreamed of.

title: Awakenings

description2: A doctor experiments with a drug that may restore life to his patients who have been catatonic for years.

title: Creation
description: From the writer of Master and Commander comes the inspirational story of how Charles Darwin created one of the most explosive ideas in history and became one of the greatest scientists the world has ever known. (2009)
description2: From the writer of Master and Commander comes the inspirational story of how Charles Darwin created one of the most explosive ideas in history and became one of the greatest scientists the world has ever known.

title: Goldstone
description: Indigenous detective Jay Swan arrives in the town of Goldstone to search for a missing person, and his simple duty becomes complicated when he uncovers a web of crime and corruption. (2016)
description2: Indigenous detective Jay Swan arrives in the town of Goldstone to search for a missing person, and his simple duty becomes complicated when he uncovers a web of crime and corruption.

title: My Tehran For Sale

description2: Marzieh is a young actress living in Tehran. The authorities ban her theatre work and, like all young people in Iran, she is forced to lead a secret life in order to express herself artistically.

title: Paranormal Activity
description: A young couple suspects that their house is haunted by a malevolent entity.They set up video surveillance to capture evidence of what happens at night as they sleep. (2009)
description2: A young couple suspects that their house is haunted by a malevolent entity.They set up video surveillance to capture evidence of what happens at night as they sleep.

title: The Butterfly Tree
description: Evelyn, a burlesque queen bewitches single dad, Al and his teenage son, Fin. As they compete for her affections, old wounds are reopened over the death of Fin's mother. (2017)
description2: Evelyn, a burlesque queen bewitches single dad, Al and his teenage son, Fin. As they compete for her affections, old wounds are reopened over the death of Fin's mother.

title: Buried
description: Paul Conroy is not ready to die but when he wakes up six feet underground, poor reception, a rapidly draining battery and a dwindling oxygen supply are his worst enemies in a tightly confined race against time. (2010)
description2: Paul Conroy is not ready to die but when he wakes up six feet underground, poor reception, a rapidly draining battery and a dwindling oxygen supply are his worst enemies in a tightly confined race against time.

title: Philomena
description: Falling pregnant as a teenager in Ireland in 1952, Philomena Lee was sent to a convent. When her baby was a toddler, he was whisked away to America for adoption. Philomena spent the next fifty years searching for him in vain. (2013)
description2: Falling pregnant as a teenager in Ireland in 1952, Philomena Lee was sent to a convent. When her baby was a toddler, he was whisked away to America for adoption. Philomena spent the next fifty years searching for him in vain.

description2: Few knew that Stalin spent his last night in the arms of a young Australian woman. Few still knew that their "love-child" brought Australia to the brink of civil war. Until now.
more: Cast Judy Davis, Richard Roxburgh, Sam Neill, Rachel Griffiths, Geoffrey Rush

title: Absolutely Anything
description: Aliens place the fate of humanity in the hands of a schoolteacher, bestowing him the ability to do absolutely anything, but only his talking dog seems to have any idea how to use the power properly. (2013)
description2: Aliens place the fate of humanity in the hands of a schoolteacher, bestowing him the ability to do absolutely anything, but only his talking dog seems to have any idea how to use the power properly.

description2: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbours a secret talent for fighting back.

title: The Kids Are All Right
description: The Allgoods family have two mums. Jules and Nic have been together for years, deeply in love. When their two children decide to seek out their biological sperm donor-dad Paul, the household will never be the same again. (2010)
description2: The Allgoods family have two mums. Jules and Nic have been together for years, deeply in love. When their two children decide to seek out their biological sperm donor-dad Paul, the household will never be the same again.

description2: In 1947, Dalton Trumbo was Hollywood's top screenwriter, until he and other artists were jailed and blacklisted for their political beliefs.

title: Gilda

description2: Johnny Farrell, a small-time gambler, is hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino where scandal ensues when he discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

title: The Little Death

title: Blessed

title: Primary Colours

title: My Kingdom

title: All That Jazz

title: Accidents Happen
description: A wickedly funny and surprisingly moving fable of family, fate and misfortune in American suburbia. The manicured lawns of 1980s New England imply an order that simply doesn't exist for the Conway family. (2011)
description2: A wickedly funny and surprisingly moving fable of family, fate and misfortune in American suburbia. The manicured lawns of 1980s New England imply an order that simply doesn't exist for the Conway family.

description2: Set in the criminal underworld of 1920s Sydney, The Tender Hook tells the story of Iris' rise to the apex of a love/power triangle, that includes her English con man lover, and an honest young boxer.

description2: The spirited coming-of-age tale of Brian Jackson, a working-class youth from Essex, who gets a chance to prove himself when he is accepted to Bristol University and wins a place on a University Challenge quiz team.

description2: Griff, office worker by day, superhero by night, has his world turned upside down when he meets Melody, a beautiful young scientist who shares his passion for the impossible.

title: The Honourable Wally Norman

description2: A meat worker is accidentally nominated to run for Parliament and realises that to save the meat works he must get elected. All that stands in his way is every politician in the country and his own fear of public speaking.
